My tasks included creating a modal to allow users to edit task estimates for a productivity board and connecting it to the backend.
I was also responsible for fixing various styling issues such as malfunctioning data table.

This is also the language used to bold{teach data structures and algorithms}.

creating GUIs using bold{WinForms}, implementing bold{filters} as well as designing new classes.
